transcript:
Customer: Kyunki tum hi ho, ab tum hi ho, zindagi ab tum hi ho, chain bhi, mera dard bhi, meri aashiqui ab tum hi ho.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Bhaiya, hi sir, good afternoon, kaise ho? Good morning.
Customer: Ji thik hai sir, bataye.
Executive: Hanji aapne bola tha call karne ke liye na, Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hanji kya concern aa rahe the sir? Wo aap band karwa rahe ho bol rahe ho ki isko start.
Customer: Nahi band nahi sir, matlab maine bhai se plan ke bare me pucha tha, bhai bol rahe the abhi mehanga hai to abhi rehne do, ye bol rahe the bhai.
Executive: Sir, sir to day by day mehanga hi hoga, sasta thodi hoga sir, aap bataiye.
Customer: Dekho koi nahi hamare bhai, hamare.
Executive: Han han.
Customer: Hamare bhai ka already chal raha hai na is vajah se maine bhai se pucha tha, Sushil bhai ko jante honge aap Sushil.
Executive: Han jante hai.
Customer: Kumar jo hai.
Executive: Hanji hanji bahut acche hai matlab unki profile acchi khasi chal rahi hai yaha se na.
Customer: Niche art karke jo company hai unka.
Executive: Dekho sir hum to aapko bolenge supported wo 35000 de rahe 35000 plus GST hai, thik hai? 32000 plus GST hamari company offer kar rahi thi, abhi bhi matlab Pranshu ji ne bola tha ki matlab hata do ab wo sir nahi karenge, fir bhi maine dekha aapki ek company chal rahi hai to hum reference de sakte hai, maine kaha ki chalo thik hai 32000 plus GST pe de do sir ko, thik hai? Aur kuch naye extra features bhi hum add on karane ke liye bol diye the, thik hai? Unhone bola credit card se karenge sir, to credit card ka bhi option de diye even hum logo ke yaha credit card available nahi hota hai generally na, to bhi hum log option de diye na.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji ji bolo, ha.
Customer: To kya issue aa raha hai? Dekho sir kahi na kahi agar 32000 aapka dekha jaye to month ka 3000 something aapka lagega, 32 plus GST ke hisab se, 3000 per month ka, itna to hamara waise hi kharche ho jate hai na sir, aur hum apne business ke liye laga rahe hai to kahi na kahi hame uske 32000 ke piche ROI bhi to accha khasa aayega.
Executive: Nahi aayega sir.
Customer: Sir koi nahi aap sham ke time call kar lena thik hai, mai thoda abhi kaam kar raha hu, thik hai.
Executive: Sham kitne baje sir bataiye? Ha sir bataiye.
Customer: Sham ko mai free hu, sham ko mai free hunga.
Executive: Kitne baje sir?
Customer: 5 baje ke time.
Executive: 5 baje sir?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir aap ek kaam karna 3 baje ya 3:30 baje tak mai kar lu aapko?
Customer: Nahi yaar dupehar me karna 1 baje.
Executive: Accha thik hai mai kar lunga, thik hai.
Customer: Ha ha ha ha.
Executive: 2 baje na?
Customer: Ji ji 1 baje 1 baje.
Executive: 1 baje, thik hai 1 baje mai aapko connect kar lunga, thik hai, thik thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's brother finds the plan expensive.

- Wants to know the monthly cost with GST.


Resolution:

- Executive offered plan at â‚¹32,000 + GST.

- Executive offered credit card payment option.

- Agreed to call back at 1 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, gst, payment, follow up
